alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pender and eastern Bladen Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rowan, or 19 miles east of Elizabethtown. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rowan, Penderlea, Lagoon, Rooks, Willard, Kelly, Lisbon, White Lake, Atkinson, and Watha. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 390 and 392. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
